The 5 elements theory is used as the basis of the universe and describes the way everything interacts, including biological systems in the human body. The 5 elements are: Earth, Water, Fire, Air and Space. Our five major organs, namely heart, liver, spleen, lungs and kidney, correspond to these five elements. Each of these organs is also linked to a flavour which helps the function of that particular organ. These 5 flavours are: Sweet, Sour, Salty, Bitter and Pungent.

100% Natural spices with no preservatives or added colour. We deliver handpicked unpolished pulses and grains to you, our esteemed customer. We do our work with passion and work religiously to ensure only the best quality products.
Our unique blends tell their stories through their aromas and the depth of flavours that they add to your food. Our spices and blends bring soul into your every recipe.
We are committed to produce safe, hygienic and the highest quality products, with the assurance of 100% reliable delivery right at your doorstep.
We understand that it is important for you to buy the best products having the best quality at the best possible prices. We are able to provide the best quality product at best affordable prices.

Customer delight is our No. 1 priority. We are dedicated to providing the best possible purchase experience to you, and pride ourselves in swiftly responding to/resolving your queries with complete transparency. To know more, please feel free to get in touch with us in the following ways:
